metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19274 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Passing an absolute path to a file_exists check in phpBB before 3.2.4allows Remote Code Execution through Object Injection by employing Phardeserialization when an attacker has access to the Admin Control Panel withfounder permissions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpbb3 - 3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
phpbb3-l10n - 3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpbb3 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
